DOC.brief_summary: Glenohumeral osteoarthritis ( OA ) account approximately 2-5 % chronic shoulder pain may classify primary secondary form . Primary glenohumeral OA cause degenerative joint disease , inflammatory arthropathy , neuropathic arthropathy secondary syringomyelia diabetes . Secondary glenohumeral OA cause trauma , postoperative change arthroscopy capulorraphy , osteonecrosis . Hyaluronic acid find synovial joint fluid viscoelastic , chondroprotective , possibly anti-inflammatory property . It show increase joint lubrication . Platelet-rich plasma contain growth factor show promote tissue regeneration . The aim study determine whether injection hyaluronic acid platelet-rich plasma use reliably decrease pain , restore function , improve quality life patient suffer glenohumeral OA . Patients randomize receive either injection hyaluronic acid injection platelet-rich plasma . Outcomes assessed via questionnaire 24 week post-procedure .
